title: How to Cook Lobster Tails
description:
This quick video will give you some tips on #howto perfectly steam lobster tails!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Lobster-Tails

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook lobster tails use sharp kitchen shears to cut the tails down to the center to remove the vein in a deep pot on the stove bring about 2 inches or 5 centimeters of water to a boil then place the lobster tails in a steamer basket in the pot and cover the pot with a lid cook the lobster tails for 4 to 12 minutes depending on the size of the lobster when the time is up carefully remove the lobster tails using tongs if the meat in the center isn't opaque and white steam the tails for another 1 to 2 minutes serve with melted butter for dipping and enjoyto cook lobster tails use sharp kitchen shears to cut the tails down to the center to remove the vein in a deep pot on the stove bring about 2 inches or 5 centimeters of water to a boil then place the lobster tails in a steamer basket in the pot and cover the pot with a lid cook the lobster tails for 4 to 12 minutes depending on the size of the lobster when the time is up carefully remove the lobster tails using tongs if the meat in the center isn't opaque and white steam the tails for another 1 to 2 minutes serve with melted butter for dipping and enjoy

title: How to Cook Medium Rare Steak
description:
Learn how to cook medium rare steak with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Medium-Rare-Steak

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook a medium rare steak heat a non-stick or cast iron frying pan to high heat on a burner and pour one tablespoon of olive oil into the pan when the oil starts to separate use tongs to place a steak in the center of the pan and let it cook for a 2 inch steak allow for about 4 minutes of cooking on each side turning only once be sure to use tongs to flip the steak as a fork can cause the meat to lose some of its juices after cooking the other side use the tongs to press the center of the steak to make sure it's done before servingto cook a medium rare steak heat a non-stick or cast iron frying pan to high heat on a burner and pour one tablespoon of olive oil into the pan when the oil starts to separate use tongs to place a steak in the center of the pan and let it cook for a 2 inch steak allow for about 4 minutes of cooking on each side turning only once be sure to use tongs to flip the steak as a fork can cause the meat to lose some of its juices after cooking the other side use the tongs to press the center of the steak to make sure it's done before serving

title: How to Cook Over Easy Eggs
description:
Learn How to Cook Over Easy Eggs with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Over-Easy-Eggs

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook an overeasy egg start by heating the oil or butter in a small pan over medium heat once the oil or butter is hot crack the egg into the pan let it cook for a few minutes or until the bottom solidifies and turns fully white then use a spatula to gently flip the egg over being careful not to break the yolk after 10 seconds flip the egg over again so that the yolk doesn't overcook transfer the egg to a plate and serveto cook an overeasy egg start by heating the oil or butter in a small pan over medium heat once the oil or butter is hot crack the egg into the pan let it cook for a few minutes or until the bottom solidifies and turns fully white then use a spatula to gently flip the egg over being careful not to break the yolk after 10 seconds flip the egg over again so that the yolk doesn't overcook transfer the egg to a plate and serve

title: How to Cook Pork Tenderloin in the Oven
description:
Learn how to cook pork tenderloin in the oven with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Pork-Tenderloin-in-the-Oven

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook pork tenderloin in the oven start by placing the pork and the marinade ingredients in a resealable plastic bag and letting it marinate for three hours next heat two tablespoons of oil or butter in an oven-proof skillet on the stove then transfer the tenderloin to the hot skillet and cook until it's brown on all sides finally place the skillet with the meat into a 425 degree fahrenheit oven and cook for 15 to 20 minutes until the juices run clearto cook pork tenderloin in the oven start by placing the pork and the marinade ingredients in a resealable plastic bag and letting it marinate for three hours next heat two tablespoons of oil or butter in an oven-proof skillet on the stove then transfer the tenderloin to the hot skillet and cook until it's brown on all sides finally place the skillet with the meat into a 425 degree fahrenheit oven and cook for 15 to 20 minutes until the juices run clear

title: How to Cook Ravioli
description:
Learn how to cook ravioli with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Ravioli

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: one easy way to cook ravioli is by boiling it first bring four quarts 4.5 liters of water for every one pound 0.5 kilograms of ravioli you're making to a boil then add the ravioli to the water and stir to keep the ravioli separated let the ravioli cook for four to six minutes or until they float to the surface of the water then drain the ravioli in a colander and add your sauce you can also cook ravioli in the microwave place the ravioli in a microwave-safe dish and add half a cup 118 milliliters of sauce and a quarter cup 59 milliliters of water for every five pieces of ravioli you're cooking cover the dish with parchment paper and microwave the ravioli on high for two minutes then take the cover off and stir the sauce into the ravioli put the parchment paper back on and heat the ravioli for two more minutes another delicious option is to bake ravioli start by preheating your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit 175 degrees celsius then coat a baking dish with a thin layer of non-stick cooking spray set the ravioli in the baking dish and pour your sauce over them finally cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake the ravioli for 55 minutesone easy way to cook ravioli is by boiling it first bring four quarts 4.5 liters of water for every one pound 0.5 kilograms of ravioli you're making to a boil then add the ravioli to the water and stir to keep the ravioli separated let the ravioli cook for four to six minutes or until they float to the surface of the water then drain the ravioli in a colander and add your sauce you can also cook ravioli in the microwave place the ravioli in a microwave-safe dish and add half a cup 118 milliliters of sauce and a quarter cup 59 milliliters of water for every five pieces of ravioli you're cooking cover the dish with parchment paper and microwave the ravioli on high for two minutes then take the cover off and stir the sauce into the ravioli put the parchment paper back on and heat the ravioli for two more minutes another delicious option is to bake ravioli start by preheating your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit 175 degrees celsius then coat a baking dish with a thin layer of non-stick cooking spray set the ravioli in the baking dish and pour your sauce over them finally cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake the ravioli for 55 minutes

title: How to Cook Sweet Potatoes
description:
Sweet potatoes, also called yams, are a delicious and nutritious food that can be made into a variety of side dishes. You can easily cook whole sweet potatoes in the oven or peel, cube, and roast them. By following a few simple steps, you'll have a scrumptious side dish in no time!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Cook-Sweet-Potatoes

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cook sweet potatoes in the oven first pre-heat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius while your oven is preheating scrub the sweet potatoes under running water then Pierce each sweet potato six to twelve times with a fork and rub olive oil on them wrap each potato loosely in aluminum foil and place them directly on the middle rack of your oven bake the potatoes for forty-five minutes letting them cool in the oven for an additional 15 minutes before serving if you have less time you can also cook sweet potatoes in the microwave after you scrub and Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork place them in a microwave-safe bowl cook the sweet potatoes for five to eight minutes rotating halfway through serve and enjoyto cook sweet potatoes in the oven first pre-heat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit or 205 degrees Celsius while your oven is preheating scrub the sweet potatoes under running water then Pierce each sweet potato six to twelve times with a fork and rub olive oil on them wrap each potato loosely in aluminum foil and place them directly on the middle rack of your oven bake the potatoes for forty-five minutes letting them cool in the oven for an additional 15 minutes before serving if you have less time you can also cook sweet potatoes in the microwave after you scrub and Pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork place them in a microwave-safe bowl cook the sweet potatoes for five to eight minutes rotating halfway through serve and enjoy

title: How to Cut a Bell Pepper
description:
Learn How to Cut a Bell Pepper with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cut-a-Bell-Pepper

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cut a bell pepper start by cutting it in half lengthwise with a sharp knife then use the knife to cut out the rib which is the white fleshy part with seeds attached to it cut out the stem from both halves of the pepper if there are any seeds left over hit each half on a flat surface so the seeds fall out finally slice the halves into thin strips you can leave the pepper and thin strips or dice it up into smaller piecesto cut a bell pepper start by cutting it in half lengthwise with a sharp knife then use the knife to cut out the rib which is the white fleshy part with seeds attached to it cut out the stem from both halves of the pepper if there are any seeds left over hit each half on a flat surface so the seeds fall out finally slice the halves into thin strips you can leave the pepper and thin strips or dice it up into smaller pieces

title: How to Cut a Mango
description:
If we were to hand you a mango RIGHT NOW, would you know how to cut it? Everyone seems to have their own way of cutting a mango, but whether you prefer it sliced or cubed, this quick video teaches you #howto properly cut a mango.

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Cut-a-Mango

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cut a mango place it on a cutting board and hold it steady while you slice it into three pieces then take the end pieces and score the fresh side of them with a knife so it looks like a grid try not to cut through the skin on the other side as you're scoring the mango once you're finished press the skin side of the mango up so the squares you scored poke out then use the knife to cut the squares away from the skin finally take the center piece of the mango and cut around the pit with a knife before peeling off the remaining skinto cut a mango place it on a cutting board and hold it steady while you slice it into three pieces then take the end pieces and score the fresh side of them with a knife so it looks like a grid try not to cut through the skin on the other side as you're scoring the mango once you're finished press the skin side of the mango up so the squares you scored poke out then use the knife to cut the squares away from the skin finally take the center piece of the mango and cut around the pit with a knife before peeling off the remaining skin

title: How to Cut a Pineapple
description:
This quick video will give you tips on #howto cut a pineapple!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Cut-a-Pineapple

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cut a pineapple first lay it on its side and cut off the top and bottom with a sharp knife then stay in the pineapple up on one end and rotate it as you slice the skin off once the skin is off remove the brown eye spots from the pineapple by cutting them out in wedges with the knife finally lay the pineapple on its side again and slice it into thin circles or chunks whichever you preferto cut a pineapple first lay it on its side and cut off the top and bottom with a sharp knife then stay in the pineapple up on one end and rotate it as you slice the skin off once the skin is off remove the brown eye spots from the pineapple by cutting them out in wedges with the knife finally lay the pineapple on its side again and slice it into thin circles or chunks whichever you prefer

title: How to Cut an Avocado
description:
Learn How to Cut an Avocado with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cut-an-Avocado

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to cut in avocado first cut through it lengthwise with a sharp chef's knife until you hit the pit then rotate the avocado to cut all the way around the pit twist and pull the two halves to separate them carefully hit the pit with your knife to get a good grip on it then twist to pull the pit out for avocado slices make evenly spaced cuts lengthwise down each half without piercing the skin then use a spoon to scoop out the slices to dice avocado make evenly spaced horizontal and vertical cuts on each half without piercing the skin and scoop out the cubes with a spoonto cut in avocado first cut through it lengthwise with a sharp chef's knife until you hit the pit then rotate the avocado to cut all the way around the pit twist and pull the two halves to separate them carefully hit the pit with your knife to get a good grip on it then twist to pull the pit out for avocado slices make evenly spaced cuts lengthwise down each half without piercing the skin then use a spoon to scoop out the slices to dice avocado make evenly spaced horizontal and vertical cuts on each half without piercing the skin and scoop out the cubes with a spoon

title: How to Cut Brownies
description:
Learn how to cut brownies with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Cut-Brownies

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: after you've baked brownies leave them to rest for one to two hours before you cut them as this helps them firm up and taste better when they're cool make a vertical cut in the middle of the brownies then cut each half in half again depending on how large you want your brownies to be make one to three horizontal cuts to create individual portions to cut your brownies to the same size try using a plastic knife to trim all four edges of the brownie before you cut the portions so each piece has a straight edgeafter you've baked brownies leave them to rest for one to two hours before you cut them as this helps them firm up and taste better when they're cool make a vertical cut in the middle of the brownies then cut each half in half again depending on how large you want your brownies to be make one to three horizontal cuts to create individual portions to cut your brownies to the same size try using a plastic knife to trim all four edges of the brownie before you cut the portions so each piece has a straight edge
